verses.verse: Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Appoint<s%> out for <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of Moses: <S%H4872><s%>

That the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unawares<s%> and <S%H1097>unwittingly<s%> <S%H1847><s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H4480>avenger<s%> <S%H1350><s%> of <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And when he that doth <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> they shall <S%H622>take<s%> him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> unto them, and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H413><s%> him a <S%H4725>place,<s%> that he may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> them.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, then they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> up into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unwittingly,<s%> <S%H1847><s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8543>formerly.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his own <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H834>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

And they <S%H6942>appointed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H7153>Kirjath-arba,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And on the other <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> they <S%H5414>assigned<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> upon the <S%H4334>plain<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H4152>appointed<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, that <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> at <S%H7684>unawares<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
